title: Aidy Bryant | Trump Repeats Election Lies at AZ Rally After Oath Keepers Sedition Charges: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Donald Trump and his loyalists in the Republican Party focusing on subverting future elections to regain power as they demonstrated at another deranged rally in Arizona.

Then, Aidy Bryant talks about having a garbage party at SNL, taking a cross-country trip with her husband and meeting Bob Saget as a child.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
